text: وَإِذْ نَادَىٰ رَبُّكَ مُوسَىٰٓ أَنِ ٱئْتِ ٱلْقَوْمَ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ

translation.en.sahih: And [mention] when your Lord called Moses, [saying], "Go to the wrongdoing people -
translation.id.indonesian: Dan (ingatlah) ketika Tuhanmu menyeru Musa (dengan firman-Nya): "Datangilah kaum yang zalim itu,
